name: Palinode (Prototype)
description:
This is a prototype - WARNING - poor early graphics may burn your eyes

The game is currently local multiplayer only (this means multiple controllers on the same machine. there are no keyboard controls)

You can use Parsec ( Google it! ) to connect with others to help with testing the game without needing multiple controllers and players in one room.

The "Resources" used to build new ships in skirmish mode will come from another element of the game which is currently inactive.

This is extremely early in the creation process and will be modified heavily, or could even be scrapped entirely.

Any and all feedback is extremely welcome, no matter how minor, obvious, or critical you may think it is.

Discord - https://discord.gg/Tme4t6V

Novonium game demo - https://novomundus.itch.io/novonium
